General.Name: creditshelf Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: creditshelf Aktiengesellschaft operates as a digital small and medium-sized enterprises financing company in Germany. It provides corporate, investment, and working capital loans, as well as corporate, project, and growth financing solutions. The company serves customers through its online platform, creditshelf.com. creditshelf Aktiengesellschaft was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
General.Address: Mainzer Landstrasse 33a, Frankfurt am Main, Germany, 60329
